metadata.title: Atta Tarar grieved over demise of Prince Karim Aga Khan

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Feb 05 (APP):Minister for Information, Broadcasting, National Heritage and Culture Attaullah Tarar on Sunday expressed a deep grief over demise of Prince Karim Aga Khan, terming him a "visionary leader" and a "symbol of unity". "Deeply Saddened by the passing of Prince Karim Aga Khan. A visionary leader and a symbol of unity, his contributions to education, health, and global peace will always be remembered," the minister wrote on X formerly Twitter. The minister also posted his grandfather, former President Rafiq Tarar's picture with Prince Karim Aga Khan on X to recall the two's special bond, which was built on mutual respect and service to humanity.
